lip.name: blush
lip.title: pocket blush
lip.subtitle: The natural flush
lip.text:
A little blush for a little flush. Our on-the-go cream blush wakes up cheeks and lips with a satiny, diffused flush that melts on smoothly and stays all day. It’s a lightweight formula that hydrates skin for baby-soft cheeks and leaves a glowy finish without a greasy feel. 
Size: 5.3g / 0.18 oz.

lip.name: tint
lip.title: peptide lip tint
lip.subtitle: The tinted lip layer
lip.text: Meet Lip Tint. Sheer-but-buildable color that melts onto lips for a hint of tint and rich, glossy finish. The nourishing, fragrance-free formula leaves lips feeling hydrated and visibly plump. Size: 10ml / .3 fl oz.

lip.name: lip trio
lip.title: the summer lip trio
lip.subtitle: Three limited edition shades
lip.text:
A collection of three limited edition Peptide Lip Tints in juicy summer shades. Our nourishing formula is packed with high-performance ingredients to visibly hydrate and plump while leaving a sheer wash of bright color.

Size: 10ml / .3 fl oz. each
Limited edition set includes: Three fragrance-free shades of Peptide Lip Tint in Shortcake, Peach Pit, and Guava Spritz

lip.name: treat
lip.title: peptide lip treatment
lip.subtitle: The nourishing lip layer
lip.text:
Meet our new rhode vanilla peptide lip treatment (previously vanilla cake) — same iconic flavor with a new name in our new head-to-toe glazed packaging. 

A nourishing treat for visibly plump, pillowy-soft lips — day or night. This dreamy formula leaves lips looking glossy and works hard to nourish and moisturize dry lips. Size: 10ml / .3 fl oz.

lip.name: case
lip.title: summer lip case
lip.subtitle: Four limited edition colors
lip.text: A silicone case for your phone that keeps your lip on hand. Our bubble design has a silky, soft touch feel and a puffy back for easy gripping. Compatible with iPhone 14 or 15 Pro/Pro Max and your favorite Peptide Lip Treatment or Tint.

lip.name: case
lip.title: lip case
lip.subtitle: lip case
lip.text: A silicone, bubble case for your phone that keeps your lip on hand. Our design has a silky, soft touch feel and a puffy back for easy gripping. Compatible with iPhone 14 or 15 Pro/Pro Max and your favorite Peptide Lip Treatment or Tint.

skin.name: cleanse
skin.title: pineapple refresh
skin.subtitle: The daily cleanser
skin.text: The first step in your rhode routine. A refreshing balm-to-lather daily cleanser formulated with polyglutamic acid (aka PGA), green tea extract, and pineapple enzyme to leave your skin clean, soft, and bouncy post-rinse. Gentle enough for morning and evening use + safe for sensitive skin. Size: 150ml/ 5fl oz.

skin.name: prep
skin.title: glazing milk
skin.subtitle: The essential prep layer
skin.text:
A nutrient-rich, lightweight essence that boosts barrier function and provides immediate, luminous hydration. Hailey's essential prep step to calm skin and begin the rhode routine. 

Same glazing formula, now in our new head-to-toe glazed packaging. Size: 140ml/ 4.7 fl oz.

skin.name: glaze
skin.title: peptide glazing fluid
skin.subtitle: The dewy hydration layer
skin.text:
Hailey’s signature step to dewy, glazed skin. A lightweight, quick-absorbing, gel serum that visibly plumps and hydrates to support a healthy-looking skin barrier. 

Same glazing formula, now in our new head-to-toe glazed packaging. Size: 50ml / 1.7oz.

skin.name: restore
skin.title: barrier restore cream
skin.subtitle: The rich recovery layer
skin.text: Rich, but lightweight, cream moisturizer to comfort, soothe, and restore the skin barrier. Our antioxidant peptide powerhouse delivers hydrated, smoother, softer skin over time. Size: 50ml/ 1.7oz.

sets.name: duo
sets.title: the coral duo
sets.subtitle: Pocket Blush + Peptide Lip Tint
sets.text:
A full look that fits in your pocket for glowy cheeks and glossy lips on-the-go. Each duo combines a paired shade of Pocket Blush with a limited edition summer Peptide Lip Tint to wear together for a juicy, monochromatic look. Pocket Blush gives cheeks and lips a satiny, diffused flush, while Peptide Lip Tint melts onto lips for sheer-but-buildable color. 

Includes 2 full size products: Pocket Blush in Spicy Marg and Peptide Lip Tint in Guava Spritz

sets.name: trio
sets.title: the summer lip trio
sets.subtitle: Three limited edition shades
sets.text:
A collection of three limited edition Peptide Lip Tints in juicy summer shades. Our nourishing formula is packed with high-performance ingredients to visibly hydrate and plump while leaving a sheer wash of bright color.

Size: 10ml / .3 fl oz. each
Limited edition set includes: Three fragrance-free shades of Peptide Lip Tint in Shortcake, Peach Pit, and Guava Spritz

sets.name: tints
sets.title: the peptide lip tints
sets.subtitle: All four shades together
sets.text:
Our complete lip tint collection of sheer-but-buildable shades that melt onto lips for a rich, glossy finish.
Includes: All four fragrance free shades of Peptide Lip Tint in Ribbon, Raspberry Jelly, Toast and Espresso

Size: 10ml / .3 fl oz each.

sets.name: treats
sets.title: the peptide lip treatments
sets.subtitle: All four scents together
sets.text:
Our complete lip treatment collection for visibly plump, pillowy-soft lips — day or night. This dreamy formula leaves lips looking glossy and works hard to nourish and moisturize dry lips.

Includes: All four scents of Peptide Lip Treatment in rhode Vanilla, Salted Caramel, Watermelon Slice, and Unscented 

Size: 10ml / .3 fl oz each.

sets.name: the kit
sets.title: the rhode kit
sets.subtitle: Four daily skin essentials
sets.text: Meet your new classics, all bundled up in the rhode bubble bag. Our tried-and-true skincare essentials are formulated for ultimate barrier nourishment, feel dreamy on your skin, and multitask in your routine. Reach for them morning and night, use solo or with other skincare, mix with makeup, and take on your travels.

sets.name: the set
sets.title: the barrier set
sets.subtitle: Skin nourishing trio
sets.text:
Three essential formulas that nourish your barrier to deliver glazed, glowy skin. This collection works together to prep, glaze, and restore your skin for a hydrated and happy barrier. Fits effortlessly into your morning and evening skincare routine and safe for all skin types.

Includes 3 full size products: Glazing Milk, Peptide Glazing Fluid, Barrier Restore Cream

sets.name: the set
sets.title: the pocket blushes
sets.subtitle: All six shades together
sets.text: The complete collection of Pocket Blush in all six shades. Our on-the-go cream blush wakes up cheeks and lips with a satiny, diffused flush that melts on smoothly and stays all day. It’s a lightweight formula that hydrates skin for baby-soft cheeks and leaves a glowy finish without a greasy feel.
